body: omg !!!!! been a long time since i been this exciting

Dear makatiss，Maybe you don't understand the grammar of a foreign language, you can't understand what I mean. But what I want to talk about is not the existence of condoms, but the problems of color and transparency. The existence of condoms is not controversial, but the focus should be to better show the beauty of this cute boy. Instead of covering everything with this inferior pink.
Ellemariachi, do you even know the side effects of birth control? Anyways, why are you so butthurt, this is a masterpiece
套子就很迷.....全部挡住了而且颜色也挺突兀

The moment he pulled out to put a condom on completely killed this for me. I get the attempt to be realistic but condoms suck. Raw sex vs. wearing a condom is incomparable. It's like comparing a Triple A steak to a buddy burger from the dollars menu. I don't come on here to be reminded of how trash sex with a condom is. Birth control isn't even that expensive; I got my ex on it before. If an author wants to go for realism & make it way hotter, go that route ffs.
